title: The defence of Constantine vvith a treatise of the Popes temporall monarchie. Wherein, besides diuers passages, touching other counsels, both generall and prouinciall, the second Roman Synod, vnder Siluester, is declared to be a meere fiction and forgery. By Richard Crakanthorp, Doctor of Diuinity.
author: Crakanthorpe, Richard, 1567-1624.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Bernard Alsop [and John Legat], for Iohn Teague, and are to besold [sic] at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Golden-Ball,
